metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000140 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: rsyslog librelp version 1.2.14 and earlier contains a Buffer Overflowvulnerability in the checking of x509 certificates from a peer that canresult in Remote code execution. This attack appear to be exploitable aremote attacker that can connect to rsyslog and trigger a stack bufferoverflow by sending a specially crafted x509 certificate.

criterions.comment: librelp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
